title: The National Trust Book of Jam: 70 mouthwatering recipes for jams, marmalades and other preserves
description: In the latest book in this bestselling series food writer and cook Sara Lewis brings together 70 mouthwatering recipes for jams marmalades and preserves. Whether it's the quintessential English strawberry (to dollop onto a scone!) or the more unusual minted marrow & blackberry jam there is a something for everyone. As well as delightful fruity jams like spiced apple & bramble raspberry & rhubarb and High Dumpsy Dearie (a mixture of apples pears plums ginger and lemon) there are tangy jellies such as sloe & blackberry or elderberry & orange and curds such as gooseberry or St Clement's. Or why not try windfall apple butter on your toast? In addition there are reduced sugar jams ideal for anyone trying to cut down sugar in your diet. There are recipes sourced from National Trust properties making the most of their seasonal produce from their kitchen gardens. Enjoy the Oxford marmalade enjoyed by Churchill at Chartwell or rose geranium and orange jelly made with fruit from the orangery at Saltram.
author: Sara  Lewis
